name: colorcli_dreamsim_maritime_memory
summary: ./dreamsim.exe "An oil painting portrays a coastal scene with three fishing b...

messages.message: ./dreamsim.exe "An oil painting portrays a coastal scene with three fishing boats pulled up on a sandy beach. The boats are painted in faded red and blue colors, with visible weathering on their hulls. In the background, white-capped waves break against dark rocks. The lighting suggests overcast conditions with diffused illumination across the entire scene.

